page.title: 12SOOTY PLATES
page.content: One craft that is probably unique to Earls Colne are sooty plates.{Ray Wood is a local artist and owns a shop named{Arty Crafty.} Ray holds white plate over a flame on a candle which makes it black with soot then Ray scratches out a picture. If he happens to make a mistake he just soots it over again. Of course,like water pastel,it smudges so Ray pours varnish over it. Some of the pictures that Ray Wood has done are of an Indian and one of Dick Joise,which worked out a bit funny for one cannot copy someone else moving about on T.V.He has also made a plate advertising the shop. Ray Wood has been on T.V. doing this.
